channel.title: Genesis, OT on Follow me and I shall make you fishers of men.
channel.description: Recent content in Genesis, OT on Follow me and I shall make you fishers of men.

item.title: Genesis 22:1-18
item.description: 1 And it came to pass after these things, that God did tempt Abraham, and said unto him, Abraham: and he said, Behold, here I am. 2 And he said, Take now thy son, thine only son Isaac, whom thou lovest, and get thee into the land of Moriah; and offer him there for a burnt offering upon one of the mountains which I will tell thee of. 9 And they came to the place which God had told him of; and Abraham built an altar there, and laid the wood in order, and bound Isaac his son, and laid him on the altar upon the wood.
